name: Dices in Space
description:
Dices in Space

Your spaceship has been incapacitated and infiltrators terrorize the corridors! Navigate through your renowned spaceship and get to the Control Room in order to save yourself from the infiltrators.

Escape the tyranny of the Unknown by rolling the dice with Space Bar and making your move with WASD/Arrows. But be careful! After you made your move it's the enemys turn to roll the dice.

And they will come after you!

Controls

Space: Throw Dice

Arrows/WASD: Move

Future Work:

- FOV for enemies and player

- Enemies should reposition while you are in the base

- Obstacles for enemies and player

- Collectibles that you carry back to the base
